thread.title: A Point of Order.

author: tribuneindia.com
title: A Point of Order.
text: AT the last meeting of the Imperial Legislative Council His Excellency the President found himself compelled to pull up Hon'ble members no less than four times when they, while speaking on the Hindu University Bill, unconsciously gave reins to their thoughts on the other subjects. The Hon'ble Sir Gangadhar Chitnavis, after pronouncing his benediction on the Hindu University said: "I will take this opportunity of paying our tribute of respectful farewell to the retiring members, our Vice-President Sir Harcourt Butler, the Hon'ble Sir Ali Iman and the Secretary Sir William Vincent." His Excellency called him to order and he sat down. Then the Hon'ble Maharaja Sir Manindra Chandra Nandy began by stating that His Excellency's Government had been singular and successful in manifold ways.
